page.description: Some print topics in Alpha Anywhere include:

case.title: Print Genie
case.description: [Print Genie] - Print, preview, email, fax, or save to a file the records in the current table or set, using any of the layouts that have been defined for that table or set.

case.title: Print Properties
case.description: [Print Properties] - Setting properties for different types of layouts.

case.title: Previewing a Report, Label, or Letter
case.description: [Previewing a Report, Label, or Letter] - How to preview, then print, save, fax, or email a layout.

case.title: Print Current Record
case.description: [Print Current Record] - How to preview, then print, save, fax, or email the current record using the current layout.

case.title: Setting Printer Options at Run Time
case.description: [Setting Printer Options at Run Time] - How to override any printer settings that are saved in the layout definition.

case.title: Specifying the Layout Filter
case.description: [Specifying the Layout Filter] - How to select and order the records to be printed.

case.title: Print Options Dialog
case.description: [Print Options Dialog] - Available when you elect to Email or Save to File a layout in the Print Genie or Print Layout Genie dialogs.

case.title: Print Layout Genie
case.description: [Print Layout Genie] - How to Â print, preview, email, fax, or save to a file the records in the current table or set using any saved layout.
